entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as being affected by a spell.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A person who is also affected by a spell and has uncontrollable dancing legs.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, mentioned in the conversation.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: A person who helps Neville and is concerned about the others.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, mentioned as being affected by a brain attack.

entities.name: herbione
entities.description: A person who is unconscious and has a bulge on their body.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: A person who yells in pain and hits the ground.

entities.name: bellatrix lestrange
entities.description: The one responsible for causing harm to others.

relationships.description: Lupin helps Neville by lifting the spell on his legs.
Harry and Sirius Black are friends, as mentioned in the conversation.
Bellatrix Lestrange causes harm to Kingsley by hitting him with a spell.
Neville is concerned about Ron's well-being after he was affected by a brain attack.
